title: 96/619/EC: Commission Decision of 16 October 1996 amending Decision 95/233/EC drawing up lists of third countries from which the Member States authorize imports of live poultry and hatching eggs (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 16 October 1996 amending Decision 95/233/EC drawing up lists of third countries from which the Member States authorize imports of live poultry and hatching eggs (Text with EEA relevance) (96/619/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Annex II to Decision 95/233/EC the following line is inserted in accordance with the alphabetic order of the ISO-code:
'KE: Kenya`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 October 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 303, 31. 10. 1990, p. 6.
(2) OJ No L 156, 7. 7. 1995, p. 76.
